entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RC1 File/New MAUI Blazor Hybrid gets several MA002 warnings about UseMaui and SkipValidateMauiImplicitPackageReferences #17561
  • Image Border clipping incorrect on Mac/iOS #17560
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling UITesting #17559
  • How are we doing in the repo? -- spot check #17556
  • [Android] DragGestureRecognizer.DropCompleted event not firing #17554
  • Changing Shell.NavBarIsVisible does not update the nav bar on Mac / iOS #17550
  • [Android] David's Control Gallery Crashes on Rotation of initial screen #17549
  • [Recipes] On rotation the CarouselView for My Recipes doesn't resize the content #17548
  • [Android] Border default background is black #17547
  • macOS / VSCode - Not compiling anymore #17541

Closed

  • Error thrown when accessing resource values with OnPlatform from Resource Dictionary #16494
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] SwipeView Execute mode does not work when using Binding Command #17371
    .NET 8 GA
  • Button stops responding on clicks after switching Command by DataTrigger #17344
  • Abysmal performance in Interop on iOS #17516
  • [MacCatalyst] Poor scroll performance in MAUI ListView #12388
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Cannot directly type culture (e.g. 'en-US') for a CultureInfo property in .NET MAUI XAML #17146
  • blazor hybrid blazorwebview mixed mode http content and untrusted ssl certificate problem #17219
  • .NET 8 iOS Release build very slow #17339

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SkiaSharp to the latest stable version #17558
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17557
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed Android's Border background to use a Transparent bg if not othe… #17555
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix ReturnType on Entry #17546
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, backport/suggested
  • [X] Double cast for OnPlat in StaticResource #17545
    area/Xaml </>
  • If NavigationRenderer is Disposed don't UpdateFrames #17544
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry

Merged

  • Bump powershell from 7.3.6 to 7.3.7 #17511
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Rollback xharness bump to 8.0.0-prerelease.23407.2 #17529
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/7.0.3xx-sr8] [net7.0] Backport UI Test fixes from main #17535
  • [net7.0] Update BindableObject API docs #17542
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Cleanup SwipeView and Propagate BC until we can fix compat layout #17418
    area/Xaml </>, control-swipeview, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/7.0.3xx-sr8] [net7.0] Remove ScrollView Leak Test #17534
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17536
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix WinUI Tests #17539
  • [release/7.0.3xx-sr8] Update Version #17532
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, Under Consideration
  • [ios] cleanup Loaded/Unloaded observers #14140
    s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, area/platform, Under Consideration
  • Remove the explicit RID on Mac Catalyst samples #16765
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - MCT Popup Scrolling Fix #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1938.49 to 1.0.2045.28 #17486
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 2 updates #17510
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17509
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 14 updates #17401
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [controls] improve "setter specificity" performance #17527
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • Improve comments in customer facing project templates #17518
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • Enable .NET 7 <MauiVersion> to work in .NET 8 SDK projects #17409
    .NET 8 GA
  • Remove Previous TitleView from Toolbar #17353
    .NET 8 GA
  • Remove reference to concrete native host app #16803
    area/hosting 🧩, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • try fix #17396 #17505
  • [X] don't expand types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area/Xaml </>, stale, Under Consideration
  • [net7.0] Backport Legacy Control Gallery #17434
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Enable performance CAs for more Core classes #17524
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [XamlC] fix generic array #17301
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • Fix iOS/Win InputTransparent layouts and add several UI tests #17286
    Under Consideration
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.5.0 to 4.7.0 #16888
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, stale, Under Consideration
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, backport/suggested, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • [net7.0] 20230912 Android Ecosystem updates AndroidX #17318
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨, Under Consideration
